normalization of the nervous and cardiovascular system; nerves are in order sound sleep excellent immunity; improve bowel function skin condition; support emotional health help to cope with stress depression increased emotional stress; participate in cell growth energy metabolism muscle work; strengthen the immune system and increase the body's resistance to various diseases.

Stress lasting 20 minutes can destroy the body's daily supply of vitamin C. But this biological active substance is our main defender ascorbic acid has a stimulating effect on the immune system stimulated the synthesis of interfere has antiplatelet and pronounced antioxidant properties and increases the body's resistance to infections. In addition vitamin C regulates the adrenal glands which produce the stress mormons adrenalin and cortical. B vitamin are 8 vitamin that perform essential tasks in the human body. These substances are necessary for the normal sanctioning of the nervous system metabolism and for the synthesis of a number of compounds. In addition B vitamin improve the activity of the cardiovascular system as well as promote good absorption of nutrient from food. Vitamin B stores are also quickly depleted under stress and the precise performance of the above functions becomes no longer possible. B vitamin are water-double vitamin that do not accumulate in the body and therefore must be taken with food every day. Since B vitamin are often in a complex in food the signs of a lack of vitamin as a rule are observed at the same time - fatigue weakness memory impairment discomfort in the heart tingling fading. if it was useful and interesting for you please like it as a sign of gratitude. It is impossible to overestimated the role of vitamin of this group on the sanctioning of the human central nervous system. Sufficient intake of them in the body is a serious prevention of such manifestations as high fatigue decreased performance frequent mood swing insomnia decreased mental activity and memory distraction. Vitamin Of thiamine has antidepressant properties reduces anxiety. With the participation of this vitamin the neurotransmitter acetylcholine is produced which helps to improve memory. Vitamin Of riboflavin has a beneficial effect on sleep gives tone and energy. Vitamin Of nicotinic acid normalized blood circulation in the vessels of the brain stimulating its work and improving attention. Vitamin Of pantothenic acid affects the level of neutral connections. Vitamin Of pyridoxine is indispensable for the sanctioning of the brain since it participates in the process of assimilating among acids necessary for the sanctioning of the brain. Its deficiency seriously affects the development of intelligence and memory. Vitamin Of colic acid is involved in the processes of expiration and inhibition of the nervous system in the production of serotonin and norepinephrine. Together on the one hand they help to calm down and ensure healthy sleep on the other hand to activate the brain when necessary. Vitamin is important for maintaining long-term and short-term memory normal speed of thinking. Vitamin B12 cyanocobolamin improves the cognitive function of the brain regulates its daily activity. In addition vitamin of this group are involve - in the metallic processes of the body transformation of substances obtained from food into energy; - in the most important processes of hematopoiesis. The role of B vitamin is indispensable in maintaining the health of the cardiovascular reproductive respiratory digestive systems as well as mucous membranes and skin.
